>
[Steel Skin](/Feats.aspx?ID=6410) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=695" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 215 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetypes** [Sentinel](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=264), [Stalwart Defender](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=205) (Level 6)

**Prerequisites**
[Sentinel Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6409); Trained in [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=49)

</column>

---

You wear your armor like a second skin, taking comfort in the protection it offers. You don't become [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=73) if you sleep while wearing armor.
name: Steel Skin
